com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.sample

Class SwtMainWindow

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acrolinx.javasdk.gui.swt.sample.SwtMainWindow

  • public class SwtMainWindow
extends Object
    The class SwtMainWindow is a sample integration of the Acrolinx Java SDK for SWT. See MainWindowEventHandler.
